schema-shared-json-pointer-pattern.description: A JSON Pointer that matches data using Unix shell-style wildcards.

parameter-shared-omit.name: omit
parameter-shared-omit.description: Drop any JSON properties matched by an omit pattern from the response.

parameter-shared-include.name: include
parameter-shared-include.description: Only include JSON properties matched by an include pattern in the response.

parameter-revision-revGet.name: rev
parameter-revision-revGet.description: The default is to query the operational state.  However, this parameter can be used to query desired state on configuration branches, such as startup and applied.  This could be a branch name, tag name or specific commit.

parameter-configs-filled.name: filled
parameter-configs-filled.description: If true, fill in attributes with default values, providing a complete set of attributes.  If false, return only the attributes that differ from the defaults.

parameter-configs-search-string.name: search-string
parameter-configs-search-string.description: If passed, prune the configuration based on the given search string and return only that portion.

parameter-configs-diff.name: diff
parameter-configs-diff.description: Identifier for the requested diff-revision.  This could be a branch name, tag name or specific commit. If passed, get the config diff between requested revision and diff-revision.

issue.description: List of issues on this action

status.description: The current status of the action

http-status.description:
An optional HTTP return code for the original
action `POST` API request.

detail.description:
An optional parameter that is useful when the
`http-status` is not in the 2xx range (e.g., 4xx
or 5xx). This is particularly useful for the `nv`
CLI to additionally collect errors from `nvued`.

type.description: Same as `detail`. Useful only for the `nv` CLI.

warnings.description: List of warnings on this action
